text: Ramón Mariano Fernández Lera (1949 - 19 May 2022), better known as Chete Lera, was a Spanish actor. He was The Red Squirrel, Secrets of the Heart, Familia, Barrio, Open Your Eyes, Flores de otro mundo, and Full Moon. Lera was born in A Estrada, Spain. Lera was killed in a car crash on 19 May 2022 in Rincón de la Victoria, Spain at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Road accident deaths in Spain
title: Chete Lera
